statements: SELECT * FROM employee_records ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT name, skill_set FROM employee_records WHERE certifications @> ARRAY['AWS'];
SELECT * FROM employee_records WHERE skill_set ILIKE '%java%' OR skill_set ILIKE '%python%';
SELECT employee_id, name FROM employee_records WHERE training_records ->> 'training_type' = 'Compliance';
SELECT * FROM employee_records WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_records WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT name, skill_set FROM employee_records WHERE certifications @> ARRAY['Java'];
SELECT employee_id, name, training_records->>'start_date' AS start_date FROM employee_records WHERE skill_set ILIKE '%developer%' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT skill_set, certifications FROM employee_records WHERE name LIKE 'John%' AND training_records->>'end_date' IS NOT NULL;
SELECT employee_id, name, skill_set, certifications FROM employee_records WHERE training_records->'courses' @> '{"course_id": 101}' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM employee_skills;
SELECT employee_id, skill_set FROM employee_skills WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_certifications ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, training_description FROM training_records WHERE employee_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_name LIKE '%Java%';
SELECT * FROM employee_skills WHERE skill_set = 'Java';
SELECT employee_id, skill_set FROM employee_skills ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_certifications WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY certification_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_records WHERE training_description LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(certification_id) AS cert_count FROM employee_certifications GROUP BY employee_id HAVING cert_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM employee_skill_sets;
SELECT employee_id, skill_set FROM employee_skill_sets WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT certification_name, employee_id FROM employee_certifications ORDER BY certification_name ASC;
SELECT training_course, completion_date FROM employee_training_records WHERE employee_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM employee_skill_sets WHERE skill_set LIKE '%Java%';
SELECT * FROM employee_skill_sets WHERE skill_set = 'Java'
SELECT certification_name, employee_id FROM employee_certifications ORDER BY certification_name DESC
SELECT employee_id, training_course FROM employee_training_records WHERE completion_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT skill_set, employee_id FROM employee_skill_sets WHERE skill_set LIKE '%SQL%'
SELECT * FROM employee_certifications JOIN employee_skill_sets ON employee_certifications.employee_id = employee_skill_sets.employee_id
SELECT * FROM employee_skills;
SELECT employee_id, skill_set FROM employee_skills WHERE skill_set = 'Programming';
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_certifications ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_training WHERE employee_id = 12345;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id, flexible_work_arrangement FROM workforce_planning WHERE flexible_work_arrangement = true;
SELECT * FROM employee_skills;
SELECT employee_id, skill_set FROM employee_skills WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_certifications ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT training_description FROM employee_training WHERE employee_id = 2 ORDER BY training_id ASC;
SELECT employee_id, flexible_work_arrangement FROM workforce_planning WHERE flexible_work_arrangement = TRUE ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSkills;
SELECT skill, proficiency_level FROM EmployeeSkills WHERE proficiency_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeWorkHistory ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, company_name, position FROM EmployeeWorkHistory WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT employee_id, training_course, trainer_name FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE training_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSkills ORDER BY proficiency_level DESC, skill ASC
SELECT certification_name, issue_date, expiry_date FROM EmployeeCertifications WHERE issue_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY expiry_date DESC
SELECT employee_id, training_course, trainer_name FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE employee_id = 12345
SELECT * FROM EmployeeWorkHistory WHERE position LIKE '%Manager%' ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT employee_id, start_time, end_time FROM EmployeeWorkSchedules WHERE working_days = 'Monday'
